See ya!
 




On fire! Veteran Michael Finley goes 8-for-9 from behind the arc.  (AP)



      San Antonio and Phoenix take care of business to win their series. 
      Michael Finley drains 
      eight 3-pointers to help the Spurs oust the Nuggets 93-78, 
      while balanced scoring by the Suns drop Kobe 
      and the Lakers 119-110.
    

  
 Related Links:• SA-DEN: Spurs 4-1 | PHO-LAL: Suns 4-1 | Bell | Bracket | Stats | Experts• Player Rankings | Mejia: Selections | Awards | Teams | Photos | Speak!


 


 

 





 Ottawa offense having no problem with superstar goalie


    

      
      What is wrong with Martin 
      Brodeur? The Senators beat the eventual Hall of Fame netminder and his 
      Devils 3-2 for a 3-1 series lead. Game 5 is Saturday night in New Jersey.
    

  
• Goldstein: No Marty Magic | Wings tip Sharks in OT


 

 





 Vlad is glad to swing for the fences in peace and quiet


    

      
      For whatever reason, Vladimir Guerrero -- you know, 2004 AL MVP, feared 
      slugger -- just doesn't 
      elicit the oohs and aahs of his peers. And it doesn't 
      matter, Scott Miller says.
